attributes.action: Allow for nightclubs in the UK to open once again.
attributes.additional_details: end here. Nightclubs for many people play a big part in developing confidence, being able to adapt to different surroundings and building relationships with new faces which is a key part to a persons everyday life. Time is moving fast and we are currently on hold to try and protect ourselves from the inevitable. We need to get back to our normal way of life and live while we still can. Life is too short.
attributes.background: Nightlife is an essential part of our youths lives. Having the ability to go out, socialise and have fun at clubs, bars, pubs etc benefits young people massively. Nightclubs have been a huge part of Britain’s culture for many years and I speak for millions of people when I say we do not want it to -

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331625
